name: Rhino
description: In the early to mid2070s, Rhino used to work together with thenetrunnerT-Bug, with whom she would do gigs inCoastview, until one of their gigs involved a client under the protection of theAnimals. TheirFixerghosted them shortly before Animals showed up at their doorstep, demanding to speak with T-Bug and challenge her. In her stead, Rhino volunteered to fight, and won. Now a member of the Animals herself, Rhino is the fist fighting champion ofRancho Coronadoand trains at a formerpaint factory.Vis instructed to fight her in order to become the champion. Rhino boasts that she has never lost a...
